mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD_DATA WHERE SUBJECT LIKE #{subject}
mapper.insert:
SELECT BOARD_DATA_SEQ.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD_DATA (SEQ, GID, POSTER, SUBJECT, CONTENT, CREATED_AT, NOTICE, COMMENT_COUNT, RECOMMEND_COUNT, VIEW_COUNT) VALUES (#{seq}, 'testgid', #{poster}, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, 0, 0)
